title: Bug 101187: Localization key required when adding
description:
Bug 101187: When adding, the localization key cannot be left blank. 

Description:
If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Attempt to add an item without providing a localization key.


OB: When the properties file has a blank key with a valid value.
EB: The text should be properly externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR: 1. Open the application
2. Go to the add item section
3. Leave the localization key field blank
4. Save the item
